titles.title: Master Sergeant Roddie Edmonds Congressional Gold Medal Act
Master Sergeant Roddie Edmonds Congressional Gold Medal Act
A bill to award a Congressional Gold Medal to Master Sergeant Roderick "Roddie" Edmonds in recognition of his heroic actions during World War II.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Master Sergeant Roddie Edmonds Congressional Gold Medal Act
This bill provides for the posthumous award of a Congressional Gold Medal to Roddie Edmonds in recognition of his achievements and heroic actions during World War II.
